```java
package mc.sn.day2;

public class BasicMain {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for(int j=0;j<8;j++) {
			int dan = j+2;
			for(int i=0;i<9;i++) {
				int value = i+1;
				System.out.println(value+"X"+dan+"="+dan*value);
			}
			//System.out.print("\n");//newLine
			System.out.println();
		}
	
	}
	
}
```
